node.title: Father Abraham: Building Altars
node.description:
The most prolific author of the New Testament, the Apostle Paul, names Abraham as the “Father of all those who believe.” Undoubtedly this is referring to spiritual lineage, with his spiritual descendants reflecting his character and life choices.

 

No matter where Abraham went, the first thing he did was to build an altar. In this message we explore these actions of Abraham – along with their spiritual implications for those living in the last days!
